docs.snippet: In the Senate yesterday the bill to punish frauds in the use of stamps and trade-marks, and the bill to confer certain additional powers on the Metropolitan Police, were reported on favorably.
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate yesterday the bill to punish frauds in the use of stamps and trade-marks, and the bill to confer certain additional powers on the Metropolitan Police, were reported on favorably.

headline.main: MISCELLANEOUS REBELLION NEWS.; GEN. LANDER'S COMMAND.

docs.lead_paragraph: A letter ot the Cincinnati Gazette, dated Camp, Kelley, opposite Cumberland, Jan. 19, says: " Gen. LANDER, sent to Remney to relieve Gen. KELLEY, Whose health precluded the Lossibility of his continuing longer in active command, fell back before Gen, JACKSON, who is 16,000 strong, and has twenty-two pieces of artillery, to this point.

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT FORTRESS MONROE.; The Blockading Service--The Constitution Not Sailed--The D'Epineuil Zouaves Gone to Annapolis Again.

docs.snippet: We doubt if any other locality in the country can present a more dismal and uncomfortable picture of wretchedness than is exhibited at the present time throughout the realm of Chickamoxen and adjacent townships. Mud adhesive, mud tenacious, mud...

headline.main: AFFAIRS ON THE LOWER POTOMAC.; A Realm of Mud on Both Sides of the River --Impossibility of Moving the Army--Condition of the Troops in Hooker's Division--The Rebels at Cockpit Point, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: We doubt if any other locality in the country can present a more dismal and uncomfortable picture of wretchedness than is exhibited at the present time throughout the realm of Chickamoxen and adjacent townships. Mud adhesive, mud tenacious, mud knee-deep, mud intolerable, mud indescribable, prevails everywhere.

docs.snippet: In the Senate, Saturday, a petition for the passage of the Metropolitan Health bill was presented. Favorable reports were made on the bill concerning the liabilities of husband and wife, and the bill to amend the act for the benefit of married women...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Senate, Saturday, a petition for the passage of the Metropolitan Health bill was presented. Favorable reports were made on the bill concerning the liabilities of husband and wife, and the bill to amend the act for the benefit of married women so as to permit them to insure the lives of their husbands.

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT ALBANY.; Action of the Legislature--The Financial Question--Corruption--Amendments to the City Charter.

docs.lead_paragraph: Besides the business which comes day by day before the public through the action of the Legislature, it is understood that the Committees are at work upon many subjects of importance, which will be presented in due season.
